name: Dominoes - Best Board Game
description:
The best original online Dominoes game!

Join the largest Dominoes community and play online against friends or a challenging computer opponent.
Be the first to clear all your Dominoes tiles to win!

Relax and unwind with this enjoyable classic.

Features:
Three challenging games to choose from:
- Draw Dominoes
- Block Dominoes
- Dominoes All Five

Simple and intuitive, “Tap to Play” for fast gameplay

This is why you’ll love playing Dominoes:
- Master your strategy to win the three types of games
- Move to higher stages and beat your best score
- Participate in in-game events
- Unwind with easy and intuitive game-play

Take a break and let your brain loose with Dominoes!
